text.$invariant:
Automatic Technology swing gate openers offer a seamless blend of convenience and security all backed by our quintessential smart technology. Automating your sliding gate is quick and easy with Automatic Technology. Our products are designed to be simple to adapt and install and are tested for their ongoing reliability, so you can ensure your gate will continue to operate just like it did the day it was installed.

What sets Automatic Technology swing gate openers apart?

contentData.description: They feature soft Stop and Start functionality to help reduce strain on the motor, ensuring it continues to operate reliably into the future.
contentData.heading: Smooth operation

contentData.description: The articulated arms work in the same way a real arm would when opening or closing the gate, using a consistent action that reduces stress on the gate, motor and mounting points.
contentData.heading: High Performers

contentData.description: Can be adapted to squeeze into tight spaces such as near an adjacent fence or wall, with add-ons like the minimum sideroom kit.
contentData.heading: Easy to install

contentData.description: Automatic service indicators that let you know when the gate is due for a service.
contentData.heading: In-built service reminders

contentData.description: TrioCode128 encryption technology and multi-frequency hopping in all Automatic Technology remotes ensures there’s no interference from other devices such as baby monitors, lights or fans.
contentData.heading: Innovative technology

contentData.description: The powerful DC motors are linked to a tough, reliable gearbox while the exteriors are weather resistant to prevent damage from the elements.
contentData.heading: Weather resistant
